column5: Decided last minute to take my son fishing today and this was the going to be our first boat launch without adult supervision.  He did great, I did ok, and we caught some fish. Not bad for a stinkin' hot day.           He was too busy catching fish to even finish his snacks... and he's always eating his snacks.   Now he needs to practice using a camera so we can get some photos of all those monsters I catch.
HMMMM Is that where I think it is?  Great pics and yes, I like to tuck behind the reeds so no one sees me catching monsters.  Nice Rob.  Enjoyed.
Ya that secret pond just down the road. It was us and 25 other boats.
awesome stuff man - He'll be tossing a flippin' stick in no time! haha Thanks for the report.
That's great. Before you know it he will be constantly wanting to go, and with a little luck he may even out fish you. Great pics by the way.
He's lipping those fish like a pro!
